Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
New_Additions.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager handles database connections and provides methods for data access. Supports both real database connections and mock data mode.
Since:
2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
harry

    Constructs a new DatabaseManager instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseManager

      public DatabaseManager()
      Constructs a new DatabaseManager instance. Attempts to establish a database connection, falls back to mock data mode if connection fails.

  • Method Details

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Checks if the database is currently connected.
      Returns:
      true if connected to database, false otherwise

    • isUsingMockData

      public boolean isUsingMockData()
      Checks if the system is currently using mock data.
      Returns:
      true if using mock data, false if using real database

    • getConnectionStatus

      public String getConnectionStatus()
      Gets the current connection status as a string.
      Returns:
      "Connected to Database" if connected, "Using Mock Data" otherwise

    • getAllMenuItems

      public List<MenuItem> getAllMenuItems()
      Retrieves all menu items from the database or mock data.
      Returns:
      List of MenuItem objects containing all menu items

    • getAllInventory

      public List<Inventory> getAllInventory()
      Retrieves all inventory items from the database or mock data.
      Returns:
      List of Inventory objects containing all inventory items

    • getAllEmployees

      public List<Employee> getAllEmployees()
      Retrieves all employees from the database or mock data.
      Returns:
      List of Employee objects containing all employees

    • getAllOrders

      public List<Order> getAllOrders()
      Retrieves all orders from the database or mock data.
      Returns:
      List of Order objects containing all orders

    • createOrder

      public boolean createOrder(Order order, List<OrderItem> orderItems)
      Creates a new order with associated order items.
      Parameters:
      order - the Order object to be created
      orderItems - List of OrderItem objects for the order
      Returns:
      true if order creation was successful, false otherwise

    • addMenuItem

      public boolean addMenuItem(MenuItem item)
      Adds a new menu item to the database or mock data.
      Parameters:
      item - the MenuItem object to be added
      Returns:
      true if menu item was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateMenuItemPrice

      public boolean updateMenuItemPrice(int itemId, double newPrice)
      Updates the price of an existing menu item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the menu item to update
      newPrice - the new price for the menu item
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • addInventoryItem

      public boolean addInventoryItem(Inventory item)
      Adds a new inventory item to the database or mock data.
      Parameters:
      item - the Inventory object to be added
      Returns:
      true if inventory item was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateInventoryQuantity

      public boolean updateInventoryQuantity(int itemId, int newQuantity)
      Updates the quantity of an existing inventory item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the inventory item to update
      newQuantity - the new quantity for the inventory item
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • addEmployee

      public boolean addEmployee(Employee employee)
      Adds a new employee to the database or mock data.
      Parameters:
      employee - the Employee object to be added
      Returns:
      true if employee was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateEmployee

      public boolean updateEmployee(Employee employee)
      Updates an existing employee in the database or mock data.
      Parameters:
      employee - the Employee object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteEmployee

      public boolean deleteEmployee(int employeeId)
      Deletes an employee from the database or mock data.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee to delete
      Returns:
      true if employee was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • getProductUsageData

      public Map<String,Integer> getProductUsageData()
      Retrieves product usage data for charts and analytics.
      Returns:
      Map with product names as keys and usage counts as values

    • getTotalSales

      public double getTotalSales(Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Calculates total sales for a given date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date for sales calculation
      endDate - the end date for sales calculation
      Returns:
      total sales amount for the specified date range

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection. This method is expected by ManagerUI.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the database connection.

    • validateInventoryForOrder

      public boolean validateInventoryForOrder(List<OrderItem> orderItems)
      Validates if there's sufficient inventory for an order before processing.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of OrderItem objects to validate
      Returns:
      true if sufficient inventory exists, false otherwise

    • updateInventoryForOrder

      public boolean updateInventoryForOrder(List<OrderItem> orderItems)
      Updates inventory by decrementing ingredient quantities when an order is placed.
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of OrderItem objects from the completed order
      Returns:
      true if inventory update was successful, false otherwise
